Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 20 of the Uniform Unincorporated Nonprofit Association Act (2008 Act) . See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 29-1116

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: A member may resign as a member in accordance with the governing principles. In the absence of applicable governing principles, a member may resign at any time.

Unless the governing principles provide otherwise, resignation of a member shall not relieve the member from any unpaid capital contribution, dues, assessments, fees, or other obligation incurred or commitment made by the member before resignation.
